target.name: customize
target.description: Copies all files from '/config/customize' folder to '/bin' folder recursively

target.name: deploy
target.description: Deploys platform to bundled server. Will copy files of config/tomcat or config/tcServer to config folder of configured bundled server.

target.name: initialize
target.description: Runs an initialization of the specified tenant in stand-alone mode, using hybris Administration Console default settings. Syntax: ant initialize [-Dtenant].

target.name: pmd
target.description: Tests the source code with the pmd rules.

target.name: production
target.description: Adjusts the wrapper script to run as hybris and creates production environment zip's for hybris Server, then restores the original settings in wrapper script

target.name: server
target.description: Configures hybris Server and restart if running

target.name: sonarsingle
target.description: Executes sonar to check a single project with the sonar rules.

target.name: updatesystem
target.description: Performs an update system on master tenant
